title: Ruin You Completely
description: I met Mathias Sloan in a club.Truth.I told him I was twenty-four.Lie.I told him my name was Olivia.Lie.I thought that I would have a one-night stand and be done with him.Truth.I didn’t know that he was my new piano instructor for the next six months…Truth.We would come together and fall apart. After him, every man was ruined.Truth.If I knew what I know now, I wouldn’t have walked to him. I would’ve turned and run…LIE.
author: Calia Read
